name: Ext_R3_EpisodeOfCare_di_condition
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EpisodeOfCare|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: Conditions/problems/diagnoses this episode of care is for
element.definition: A list of conditions/problems/diagnoses that this episode of care is intended to be providing care for.
element.comment: `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition` maps to R5 `EpisodeOfCare.diagnosis.condition`. Has no type mapping Changed from a single value to an array (max cardinality from 1 to *). So is mapped as RelatedTo.
